note:
Hi, I'm a luchador alter-ego and I follow journalists and news sources. I keep MDonaldson abreast of current events so his personal account can remain mostly news-free.

This luchador fights alone so you don't have to follow me back. I doubt I'll post anything here though I may occasionally reply or comment and boost things that I'd like to reference later.

That said, feel free to seek out and follow the man behind the mask â†’ https://mas.to/@qburns
